Installation of the &LessGenerators; Package
To install this package just extract the package's archive file to the &GAP; pkg directory.
By default the &LessGenerators; package is not automatically loaded by &GAP; when it is installed. You must load the package with
LoadPackage( "LessGenerators" );
before its functions become available.
